body_html:
I have seen elsewhere in the issue tracker mention that this section of configure code may change soon, so rather than making a pull request immediately I will just say here how I fixed the script for this specific problem. This would also fix Issue #11029

Instead of using locate use whereis, which checks the $PATH alone.

Line 276 becomes
loc="$(whereis libdl.so.2 | awk '{print $2}')"

Unfortunately whereis has no easy to detect failure status, so there should be an empty check for $loc to make the script more robust (though not having libdl is a very bad sign).

body:
I have seen elsewhere in the issue tracker mention that this section of configure code may change soon, so rather than making a pull request immediately I will just say here how I fixed the script for this specific problem. This would also fix Issue #11029

Instead of using `locate` use `whereis`, which checks the $PATH alone.

Line 276 becomes
`loc="$(whereis libdl.so.2 | awk '{print $2}')"`

Unfortunately whereis has no easy to detect failure status, so there should be an empty check for $loc to make the script more robust (though not having libdl is a very bad sign).
